name: torn soul
description:
+ ! please be warned of mild visual effects and heavy screen shake in this game ! +

content warning:

death, violence, suicide, blood

no one is ever brought before the old ones anymore. but somehow your soul ended up there after your tragic death. you're offered a chance to return to life, but it will require risking your mortal soul in an abyss full of monsters. if you don't make it through the abyss before your soul runs out.. you'll be lost forever...

special buttons:

+ j - changes bgm to horror noises (and back)

+ m - speeds up game (text and motion) while held

+ left-mouse hold - skips intro dialog and retries at game over

music credit to:  request - Rin's Theme, Samza - Shattered Souls (awesome pieces both found on opengameart.com!)

note: this is the only working version on this game. no further updates will be made to it.
